Feature.Name: Slothful
Feature.Text: The bearer of this item feels slothful and lethargic. While attuned to the item, the bearer requires 10 hours to finish a long rest.

MagicProperty.Name: Quirk - Slothful
MagicProperty.Description: The bearer of this item feels slothful and lethargic. While attuned to the item, the bearer requires 10 hours to finish a long rest.
